cause.description:
Make the dictator of Iran: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, step off power. This man has advocated for the destruction of Israel and "erase it off the map", while at the same time, openly developing a nuclear weapon. If you don't want the world to go into Nuclear Holocaust, lets get rid of him.
1. Mahmoud Ahmadinejad's rule over Iran must end immediately.
2. A Nuclear Hollocaust is coming as long as Mahmoud Ahmadinejad is in power in Iran.
3. Mahmoud Ahmadinejad is seeking the wipe-out of a country with nuclear weapons.
cause.mission: Make the dictator of Iran: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, step off power.
cause.name: Get rid of Ahmadinejad
